articles.title: Final hours: These early Best Buy Black Friday deals end today - CNET
articles.description: It's an early look at what the holiday sales will be, and there are some great opportunities to save.
articles.content:

Black Friday has come early to Best Buy, but today's the final day. Every section of the website has a great Black Friday deal listed, and clearly marked with a price guarantee. … [+3349 chars]

articles.title: 'Stardew Valley' creator's next game is 'Haunted Chocolatier' - Engadget
articles.description: Stardew Valley creator Eric Barone, aka "ConcernedApe," has made a surprise unveiling of his next game, Haunted Chocolatier..
articles.content: Stardew Valley creator Eric Barone, aka "ConcernedApe," has made a surprise unveiling of his next game, Haunted Chocolatier. It has the same pixelated SNES look as Stardew, with characters, set-piece… [+1760 chars]
